meanings.definition: A plant of the nightshade family with a forked root resembling a human form, believed to have magical properties.
meanings.sent1: Legends say that mandragoras scream when uprooted.
meanings.sent2: The mandragoras in the garden were said to bring good luck.
meanings.sent3: The mandragoras in the potion shop started singing opera!
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as captivating as a field of mandragoras in bloom.
meanings.sent5: The mandragoras' eerie appearance made them unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A plant of the nightshade family with a forked root resembling a human form, believed to have magical properties.
meanings.sent1: In ancient times, mandragoras were used in rituals.
meanings.sent2: The witch brewed a potion using mandragoras and other herbs.
meanings.sent3: The mandragoras at the market whispered secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: His power was as potent as the essence of mandragoras.
meanings.sent5: The mandragoras' mystical aura filled the room.
